metadata.title: CVE-2019-18874 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
psutil (aka python-psutil) through 5.6.5 can have a double free. Thisoccurs because of refcount mishandling within a while or for loop thatconverts system data into a Python object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-18874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-psutil - 5.4.2-1ubuntu0.1
python3-psutil - 5.4.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-psutil package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.2-1ubuntu0.1').
